credit_line: Purchased for the Museum by the Advisory Council
title: Fantasy of an Architectural Ruin
provenance: from the collection of Leon Decloux
medium: Pen and ink, brush and watercolor washes with white gouache over graphite on off-white laid paper
description: Antique sepulchers and ruins with figures in the foreground are presented in an oval format. A stairway leads to a triumphal arch at right, adjacent to a column.  In the distance at left, architectural forms incorporating arches balance the composition. Ruled lines in pen and ink.
name: Drawing
